spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent with the blueprint. Major rooms (3 BHK) and living areas are correctly sequenced. Minor discrepancies in door swing clearance and the exact aspect ratio of the main living-dining hall.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent room adjacency. All toilets and utility areas depicted in the 2D plan are accounted for. Balcony structures are correctly placed at the Master Bedroom and Living room perimeters.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture layout follows the suggested placement in the blueprint well. Dining table and sofa set scale are appropriate, though bedroom storage units are slightly simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with soft, even lighting. Neutral color palette helps legibility, though some minor blurring is present on edges of further-most walls.

detected_errors.description: Internal door between Bedroom-1 and the passage is slightly shifted compared to zero-wall alignment in 2D.
The utility area attached to the kitchen appears marginally wider than the 6'8" dimension specified in the floor plan.
Slight geometric softening/blurring on the kitchen cabinetry and utility wall junction.
